column2: 18.3 Aircraft General: The maximum aircraft capacity is not limited for all overwater?
column3: The maximum aircraft capacity is not limited for all overwater flights requiring life rafts.
3AA-3UE: 181 seats (172 passenger seats + 2 pilot seats + 1 observer seat + 6 FA jumpseats
3UF-3VM: 182 seats (172 passenger seats + 2 pilot seats + 2 observer seats + 6

column2: 18.3 Aircraft General: FA jumpseats Life raft seating capacity is 193. This includes?
column3: FA jumpseats Life raft seating capacity is 193. This includes all required flight crew, passengers, observers and non-working crew members. Infants and other children not occupying a seat are not counted towards this limitation.
